title: Petition 2: Edits stay in place (need authority figure to participate in discussion)
content:
I never used IMs much, but I do like to correct spelling, grammar  
: )  
or go back and add a link, etc. But sometimes, if someone has already replied, it seems disjointed (posterity is watching).
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
I would like that to be fixed before something like IMs.  
I hardly ever edit posts now, eventhough I often want to add and/or correct something or put in proper links if I didn't at first.

This is on the top of our to-do list. No need to petition!

Please use feedback forms! :)
You mean "grammar", but you probably don't want to go back and fix it. ;) Actually, I guess editing the first post is ok.
